arts.ttl: Liverpool boss Arne Slot gets Martin Zubimendi message that says it all
arts.sum: Liverpool transfer target Martin Zubimendi's last-gasp change of heart looks to have turned out to be a blessing for Arne Slot and Ryan Gravenberch

arts.ttl: Barcelona & Real Madrid stars nominated for La Liga Player of the Month
arts.sum: Leading players from Spanish football’s two top clubs have on Wednesday been nominated for La Liga’s Player of the Month award for November. From table-topping Barcelona, Dani Olmo gets the…

arts.ttl: Real Betis, Real Sociedad and Nottingham Forest interested in Beerschot’s young Saudi Arabian striker
arts.sum: According to Qatari sports media Alkass TV Sports, Marwan Al Sahafi is attracting interested from a few clubs in England and Spain. The report named three of the interested clubs;…

arts.ttl: Athletic Club pair back in training ahead of Real Sociedad clash
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Athletic Club were on Wednesday afforded a timely double boost on the personnel front. This came by way of the return of two important members of Ernesto…

arts.ttl: Martin Zubimendi, Joshua Kimmich and six midfielders Man City should target in the January transfer window to replace Rodri and cure Pep Guardiola's biggest headache
arts.sum: City lost at Tottenham to exit the Carabao Cup, suffered a first defeat in the Champions League for more than two years when they were beaten by Sporting CP and fell five points behind Liverpool in the Premier League by losing at Bournemouth and then Brighton. If that does not seem like a huge drop-off, consider this: Guardiola's side were unbeaten in each of the 34 Premier League games the midfielder played last season.
